parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: This parameter is required for scenarios that need idempotence. The UUID that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

parameters.name: ImmediatelyRelease
parameters.description: This parameter is required for unsubscription scenarios. Valid values: 1 and 0. A value of 1 specifies that the instance is immediately released. A value of 0 specifies that the instance is shut down based on the shutdown policy. This parameter is supported only for specified services. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance. This parameter is required for unsubscription scenarios. Do not specify a custom name for this parameter.

parameters.name: ProductCode
parameters.description: The code of the service. This parameter is required for unsubscription scenarios.

parameters.name: ProductType
parameters.description: The type of the service. This parameter is required for unsubscription scenarios. Unless otherwise specified, set this parameter to an empty string.
